topics.body:
So far the whole plot of the Manga

Natsuo thinks she's hot shit.

New people arrive and they show that they are a million times better than her

Natsuo doesn't like that and gets jealous

And she wants to prove that she's indeed hot shit

While being a giant douche to people at the same time
